Pre-Game Insights: The stage for the summit clash is all set as the opponents for the ICC Men's T20 World Cup have been officially named. Two undefeated sides will lock horns to get their hands on the silverware. While one team will look to bring their first-ever title, another is aiming to end their trophy-less run.
The Rohit Sharma-led India will be up against the Aiden Markram-led South Africa, and the title will be up for grabs.
Weather in Bridgetown, Barbados is expected to be cloudy and windy with a thunderstorm in parts of the area. Over 50% of rainfall is expected to happen in the Barbados area.
Miscellaneous Highlights: If the weather affects the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024 final, the umpires will be compelled to cut down the overs. Even though there is a reserve day in place, the match officials will look to end the match on the same day. Rain will be a trouble for both teams in terms of their practice and the pitch could see significant changes due to the dampness.
